ai-mil6.2.3:1.1_0: “Venerable Sir, there is something that there is.”
ai-mil6.2.3:1.2_0: “The perfected ones have a joyful mindfulness, great king. There’s no joy in me.”
ai-mil6.2.3:1.3_0: “But sir, if you do, you commit an offense.”
ai-mil6.2.3:1.6_0: “A hut, great king, is invited, and she perceives the wrong time, and she invites him to take place aside, and she does not perceive.”
ai-mil6.2.3:2.1_0: “Venerable Sir, you’re not to say to you,
ai-mil6.2.3:2.2_0: ʻThose who’ve committed the same offense for which offenses are the reason why are they don’t know or see.’
ai-mil6.2.3:2.3_0: Would a perfected one, would a fully awakened Buddha speak ill of the noble ones?”
ai-mil6.2.3:3.1_0: “Sir, if you don’t commit an offense, there’s no offense for a perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha.”
ai-mil6.2.3:3.2_0: “Great king, there is no offense for just that.”
ai-mil6.2.3:4.1_0: “Well then, sir, what reason do you think of me?”
ai-mil6.2.3:4.2_0: “Great king, these two defilements are sent for the world, and enjoying the pleasures of the world.
ai-mil6.2.3:4.4_0: The ten ways of doing unskillful deeds is called the world.
ai-mil6.2.3:4.5_0: What kind of person is avoiding?
ai-mil6.2.3:4.6_0: there is in the world unvirtuous, blamelessness, and blamelessness.
ai-mil6.2.3:4.7_0: Herein, the Buddha laid down training rules for his disciples, and not because he lives without fault.
ai-mil6.2.3:4.8_0: “Great king, the Victor in the World, Great King, the Vajjians,
ai-mil6.2.3:4.9_0: and has arisen in the world, Great King, who is knowledgeable in the world, who is the victor’s instructions.
ai-mil6.2.3:4.10_0: Who is playing in water, great king, the Vajjians know the conqueror of the world,
ai-mil6.2.3:4.11_0: Such is that kind of victor’s instruction is said to be the Vajjians.
ai-mil6.2.3:4.12_0: and he is incapable of the world with defilements ended:
ai-mil6.2.3:5.1_0: He’d cut off the cliff, but only those he does not know.
ai-mil6.2.3:5.2_0: all is no one of those a perfected one, in whom all the of them did not know all.
ai-mil6.2.3:5.3_0: Saying non-human king, the Master Gotama, who gives the path to his kinsmen,
ai-mil6.2.3:5.5_0: he’d know the six deep knowledges, which is referred to another:
ai-mil6.2.3:5.6_0: The Realized One knows all things.”
ai-mil6.2.3:5.7_0: “Good, sir, would you agree with such a dragon?”
